title: Put Your Dukes Up John
lyrics:
[Verse 1: Alex Turner]
Just put your dukes up, John
Yeah, put your dukes up, John
You were preened and sanitised
Struck dumb by good advice
Your integrity was bruised
Your celebrity a ruse
They pulled the rug from under
Made way for new pretenders
[Chorus: Alex Turner, 
Matt Helders & Jamie Cook
]
Put your dukes up, John
(
Change your tune and change your hair
)
Put your dukes up, John
(
Or you're not going anywhere
)
Put your dukes up, John
(
Change your tune and change your hair
)
Put your dukes up, John
(
Or you're not going anywhere
)
[Post-Chorus: Alex Turner & Jamie Cook]
And be a C-Y-N-I-C
Be a C-Y-N-I-C
[Verse 2: Alex Turner]
The profit margin blinds them
They groomed and ostracised him
His calm makes my blood boil
His calm makes my blood boil

[Chorus: Alex Turner, 
Matt Helders & Jamie Cook
]
Put your dukes up, John
(
Change your tune and change your hair
)
Put your dukes up, John
(
Or you're not going anywhere
)
Put your dukes up, John
(
Change your tune and change your hair
)
Put your dukes up, John
(
Or you're not going anywhere
)
[Post-Chorus: Alex Turner & Jamie Cook]
And be a C-Y-N-I-C
Be a C-Y-N-I-C
[Bridge: Matt Helders & Jamie Cook, 
Alex Turner, Matt Helders & Jamie Cook
]
Change your tune and change your hair
Or you're not going anywhere
Change your tune and change your hair
Or you're not going anywhere
Change your tune and change your hair
Or you're not going anywhere
Change your tune and change your hair
Or you're not going anywhere
[Chorus: Alex Turner, 
Matt Helders & Jamie Cook
]
Put your dukes up, John
(
Change your tune and change your hair
)
Put your dukes up, John
(
Or you're not going anywhere
)
Put your dukes up, John
(
Change your tune and change your hair
)
Put your dukes up, John
(
Or you're not going anywhere
)

[Outro: Alex Turner, 
Matt Helders & Jamie Cook
]
And be a C-Y-N-I-C
(
Change your tune and change your hair
)
And be a C-Y-N-I-C
(
Or you're not going anywhere
)
And be a C-Y-N-I-C
(
Change your tune and change your hair
)
And be a C-Y-N-I-C
(
Or you're not going anywhere
)
